nodes.text: Mond was a male sergeant who served in the military during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the resurgent Sith Empire.

In 3643 BBY, he and other soldiers were called to the planet Sebaddon to stop an army of hex droids that plan to wipe out the entire galaxy. During the attack, Mond served in Larin Moxla's squad to begin the attack. Just before take-off, he received instructions from Larin, along with the squadron, which also includes Ses Jopp who started to jump first.
